label: Audium
description: Currently building a full-stack web application based on Spotify. It uses Angular 4 (HTML/CSS/TypeScript) on the front end, with a backend REST API built with Spring Boot (Java) and uses MySQL for the DB.

label: GeometricVR
description: Built a virtual reality app that visualizes 3D shapes for iOS/Android in Unity with the GoogleVR SDK and C#

label: Premier League Data Visualization
description: Built an interactive website that visualized a soccer data set with D3.js and Materialize for the front-end design.

label: Supplemental Security Income
description: Worked on converting a database built in Microsoft Access to SQL Server with Visual Basic .NET for the Suffolk County Dept. of Social Services.

label: Robot Arm
description: A high school project built to compete in the 2012 and 2013 NY Science Olympiad Competition.
